hero.monitoring: Real-time wallet monitoring, AML checks, infrastructure audit, and an external crypto manager. Connected in 1 day. No access to your private keys.

list.title: Lack of real-time transaction monitoring
list.description: The company has no regulated process or tool that logs and notifies about incoming/outgoing transactions on corporate wallets in real time.

list.title: Receiving and sending high-risk funds
list.description: Crypto assets with a high-risk origin (linked to fraud, sanctions lists, darknet markets, mixers, etc.) enter the company's operations without prior risk-based control.

list.title: Human factor and weak access control model
list.description: Private keys/passwords/signing rights are concentrated among specific employees; no multisignature, no role-based separation, no action logging. Storage and recovery policies are either not documented or not followed.

criminalistics.description: We conduct comprehensive crypto investigations in cases of theft or fraud. Our goal is to trace the movement of funds, gather evidence, and maximize the chances of recovery. What the service includes:

plans.title: Transaction History Analysis
plans.subtitle: Building a map of asset movements in the blockchain

plans.title: Recipient Identification
plans.subtitle: Identifying addresses and services to which funds were transferred.

plans.title: Marking Stolen Assets
plans.subtitle: Assigning 'stolen' tags and adding addresses to industry databases

plans.title: Exchange and Partner Notifications
plans.subtitle: Sending official alert requests to freeze and block assets

plans.title: Legal Support
plans.subtitle: Preparing a package of documents for interaction with exchanges, issuers, and law enforcement

plans.title: Monitoring and Support
plans.subtitle: Constant tracking of asset movements and informing the client about the status

result.title: Result
result.description: The client receives an objective assessment of the chances of recovery and a full investigation report, including the transaction map, identified addresses, and actions taken to block assets
